message: Hi Bob, I'm excited to offer you this great product. I think you'll really like it. I'm willing to sell it to you for $120.
I'm interested in the product, but I was thinking more along the lines of $90. I'm willing to make a serious offer, but I need to stay within my budget.
I understand you're on a tight budget, Bob. However, I've got some expenses to cover, so I need to make a bit more than $90. I'm willing to meet you halfway at $110. What do you think?
I appreciate your willingness to meet me halfway, but I'm still a bit above my budget. I can do $95, but that's as high as I can go. Can you meet me at that price?

I can see you're really interested in the product, Bob. I'm willing to make a slight concession, but I still need to make a profit. I can meet you at $105, but that's as low as I can go. What do you think?
I'm really close to my budget, but I'm still a bit short. I can do $98, but that's as high as I can go. Can you meet me at that price?

I'm starting to think we're getting close to a deal, Bob. I'm willing to make one more concession, but I need to think about my costs. I can meet you at $110, but that's as low as I can go. I'm not sure if I can go any lower than that.
I appreciate your willingness to make concessions, but I'm still not comfortable going above $98. I'm willing to meet you halfway at $104, but that's as high as I can go. Can you meet me there?

I'm not sure if we're going to get there, Bob. I'm willing to make one last attempt to meet you in the middle. I can meet you at $106, but that's as low as I can go. After this, I'll have to consider other options.

I appreciate your last offer, but I'm still not comfortable with the price. I'm willing to meet you at $102, but that's as high as I can go. If you're not willing to meet me there, I'll have to explore other options.
